nodes.text: Dru Velton was a Human female born on Zakuul, in Wild Space who served the Eternal Empire during their rule of the galaxy. A pilot, Velton was capable of operating a walker in combat. In 3631 BBY, she was deployed against The Commander and their allies in the Endless Swamp, and was killed when her walker was disabled.
Dru Velton was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 Digital Expansion.
